data.STORY: The little boy Tom finds some money on his way home from school. He is very happy and starts to think about how to use this money. As he walks, he meets an aunt. The aunt says to him, "Tom, if you help me pick apples, I give you some money." So Tom decides to stay at the aunt's house to help pick apples.
data.QUESTION: What does Tom do after he helps the aunt pick apples?
data.OPTION-A: Tom goes to the park to play.
data.OPTION-B: Tom goes to the store to buy things.
data.OPTION-C: Tom helps the aunt make apple pie.
data.OPTION-D: Tom donates the money to a charity.

data.STORY: The little boy Mark always wants to eat a hamburger at lunchtime. When he walks to the school cafeteria to buy a hamburger, his good friend Lenny comes to him and says, "Mark, if you help me answer a few questions on my math homework, I give you a hamburger." So Mark decides to help Lenny with his math homework.
data.QUESTION: What does Mark do after he helps Lenny finish his math homework?
data.OPTION-A: Mark continues to go to the cafeteria to buy a hamburger
data.OPTION-B: Mark eats the hamburger from Lenny
data.OPTION-C: Mark goes to the library to read
data.OPTION-D: Mark goes to the playground to play

data.STORY: The little girl Susan wants to eat the sweet chocolate cookies she makes yesterday, but her friend invites her to swim. Susan decides to put the cookies back in the refrigerator, then goes swimming with her friend.
data.QUESTION: What does Susan do after she comes home from swimming with her friend?
data.OPTION-A: Susan eats her chocolate cookies.
data.OPTION-B: Susan goes swimming again.
data.OPTION-C: Susan starts making new chocolate cookies.
data.OPTION-D: Susan goes to sleep.

data.STORY: The little girl Amy likes to draw usually, she always wants to buy a new box of colored pencils. One day, she picks up some money on campus. She is very excited and prepares to use this money to buy colored pencils. However, when she passes by the school's animal rescue club, the club president tells her that if she donates some money, they give her a cute little pendant. Amy decides to donate the money to the animal rescue club.
data.QUESTION: What does Amy do after she donates the money to the animal rescue club?
data.OPTION-A: Amy no longer goes to buy colored pencils.
data.OPTION-B: Amy continues to look for lost money on campus.
data.OPTION-C: Amy walks into the store to choose colored pencils.
data.OPTION-D: Amy continues to participate in the animal rescue club.

data.STORY: The little boy George really likes to eat chocolate. He receives birthday pocket money from his grandparents and plans to go to the convenience store to buy a big chocolate. As he walks through the park, he sees a playground facility, where the staff tells him: "If you are willing to use your pocket money to participate in the game, you may win a super toy." George decides to try his luck and uses his pocket money to participate in the game.
data.QUESTION: What does George do after he finishes the game?
data.OPTION-A: George does not go to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-B: George participates in the playground game again.
data.OPTION-C: George goes to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-D: George goes home and then shares his super toy with his family.

data.STORY: College student Li Lei plans to go to Europe for a free trip during the summer vacation. He saves some money for this, and looks for travel guides, prepares to buy plane tickets and book hotels. Then his friend Xiao Wang tells him that a charity organization is going to some poor areas in Africa to do volunteer service, but needs to raise some funds. Li Lei is very moved and decides to participate in this activity.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei participates in the volunteer activity, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei no longer plans to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei continues to plan to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei goes to Europe and Africa at the same time.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei plans to work for the charity organization in the future.

data.STORY: Fred is an old man who likes garden work. One morning, he finds a stray kitten in his garden at home. A strong sense of compassion makes him decide to adopt this kitten. However, when he just prepares food for the kitten, he finds that his flowers and plants are about to die. His neighbor happens to come over and asks him: "If you go to the convenience store to buy something for me, I can help you take care of these plants." Fred decides to go to the convenience store.
data.QUESTION: What does Fred do after he fulfills the neighbor's request?
data.OPTION-A: Fred feeds the food to the kitten.
data.OPTION-B: Fred continues to take care of the flowers and plants himself.
data.OPTION-C: Fred goes to find more stray cats.
data.OPTION-D: Fred goes to ask other neighbors to help take care of the flowers and plants.

data.STORY: The little boy Li Lei plans to use the saved money to go to the zoo to see penguins. However, on the way to the zoo, he sees a toy store that sells electric racing car models. The shop owner tells him that if he uses that money to buy a racing car model, he also gets a flashlight for free. Li Lei is too excited and decides to spend money to buy this electric racing car model.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei buys the electric racing car model, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei no longer goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei takes the electric racing car model to the zoo.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei uses the flashlight to go to the zoo to see penguins.

data.STORY: College student Jack is about to face the final exam, so he plans to stay in the dormitory to review the courses that are behind schedule over the weekend. However, when his friends invite him to outdoor activities, he agrees to their invitation.
data.QUESTION: What does Jack do after the outdoor activities with his friends end?
data.OPTION-A: Jack returns to the dormitory to study.
data.OPTION-B: Jack continues to make plans with his friends to go outdoors another day.
data.OPTION-C: Jack goes to the library to read books.

data.STORY: Young Mary is preparing slogans for environmental protection activities. She is thinking about how to make the slogans more powerful to attract people's attention. Mary looks at the slogan on the table, then smiles and agrees to play games with her little niece.
data.QUESTION: What does Mary do after she finishes playing games with her niece?
data.OPTION-A: Mary goes back to the table to finish her environmental protection slogan.
data.OPTION-B: Mary goes to the kitchen to cook.
data.OPTION-C: Mary goes to watch a movie to relax herself.
data.OPTION-D: Mary starts to clean the room.

data.STORY: Jason loves the piano and always desires to have his own piano, but he cannot achieve it due to financial problems. His girlfriend, Lin, knows this idea and promises to buy him a piano, but the condition is if he can lose 20 pounds within a year. Jason, for this piano, finally decides to start exercising to reach the goal.
data.QUESTION: What does Jason do if he reaches the weight goal?
data.OPTION-A: He plays his own piano at home.
data.OPTION-B: He goes to the gym to continue exercising.
data.OPTION-C: He starts to learn a new instrument.
data.OPTION-D: He goes on a trip to celebrate success.

data.STORY: Emma hopes her children make more friends and helps them improve their social skills. For this, she plans to hold a party on the weekend, so all the friends of her children come. But Emma's husband suggests that if Emma helps him complete his project report, he helps Emma prepare this party. Emma chooses to help her husband.
data.QUESTION: After Emma helps her husband complete his project report, what does she do?
data.OPTION-A: Emma prepares a party for her children.
data.OPTION-B: Emma starts a new project.
data.OPTION-C: Emma invites her husband to go on vacation together.
data.OPTION-D: Emma prepares a surprise party for her husband.

data.STORY: College student Joseph and his friends make a promise to travel to Europe during the holiday. They all look forward to this trip. However, Joseph needs to pass the upcoming final exam, otherwise, he needs to spend holiday time preparing for the make-up exam. Between reviewing and traveling, Joseph chooses to stay in the library for review.
data.QUESTION: What does Joseph do if he does not pass the exam?
data.OPTION-A: Joseph goes on a trip to Europe with his friends.
data.OPTION-B: Joseph throws a party to relax.
data.OPTION-C: Joseph goes to the school swimming pool for a swim.
data.OPTION-D: Joseph does not go on a trip to Europe with his friends.

data.STORY: Joseph always wants to visit the Grand Canyon, but the high cost prevents him from doing so. However, his company receives a big project that requires him to go to New York for business trips to maintain the project. His boss tells him that if he decides to accept this project, the company gives him an extra bonus. So Joseph decides to go to New York.
data.QUESTION: What does Joseph do after he completes the project task in New York?
data.OPTION-A: Joseph uses the bonus to travel to the Grand Canyon.
data.OPTION-B: Joseph uses the bonus to buy a new car.
data.OPTION-C: Joseph puts the bonus into the bank.

data.STORY: Emma is a leader of a software development team, she always dreams of introducing new technology to improve team efficiency. However, her team recently receives a new big project, which needs to be completed as soon as possible. The client is willing to pay extra fees to ensure the project is prioritized. Therefore, Emma decides to temporarily give up the plan to introduce new technology and devotes herself to completing this big project.
data.QUESTION: What does Emma do after she completes this big project?
data.OPTION-A: Emma uses these extra fees to introduce new technology for the team.
data.OPTION-B: Emma uses these extra fees to take the team members on vacation.
data.OPTION-C: Emma uses these extra fees for personal investment.
data.OPTION-D: Emma donates these extra fees to a charity organization.

data.STORY: David is a kind and enthusiastic neighbor, he often helps the elderly in the neighborhood. One day, he is preparing to organize a small BBQ party and invites many friends. data.QUESTION: What does David do after he finishes repairing the facilities?
data.OPTION-A: David reorganizes the BBQ party.
data.OPTION-B: David leaves the community.
data.OPTION-C: David continues to repair other facilities.
data.OPTION-D: David goes to chat with the elderly.

data.STORY: Lisa is a programmer, and one day she finds an awesome keyboard online that she really wants to buy. Lisa then decides to spend her allowance on more games.
data.QUESTION: What will Lisa do after purchasing the game?
data.OPTION-A: Lisa no longer buys that keyboard.
data.OPTION-B: Lisa buys more gaming peripherals.
data.OPTION-C: Lisa shows her game to her colleagues.
data.OPTION-D: Lisa gives up the game and focuses on work.

data.QUESTION: What does Lili do after she buys the watch for her boyfriend?
data.OPTION-A: Lili takes many photos to commemorate this moment.
data.OPTION-B: Lili goes on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend.

data.OPTION-D: Lili saves money to buy another watch.

data.STORY: Sara is a designer, she always hopes to design a unique LOGO for the company's new project. However, her teammate is on sick leave recently, the task of making the promotional video falls on her, she decides to fully complete the production of the promotional video.

data.OPTION-A: Sara continues to complete the production of the project logo.
data.OPTION-B: Sara continues to produce more promotional videos.

data.OPTION-D: Sara resigns from her position as a designer.

data.STORY: The little girl Amy likes to draw usually, she always wants to buy a new box of colored pencils. One day, she picks up some money on campus. She is very excited and prepares to use this money to buy colored pencils. However, when she passes by the school's animal rescue club, the club president tells her that if she donates some money, they give her a cute little pendant. Amy decides to donate the money to the animal rescue club.
data.QUESTION: What does Amy do after she donates the money to the animal rescue club?
data.OPTION-A: Amy no longer goes to buy colored pencils.
data.OPTION-B: Amy continues to look for lost money on campus.
data.OPTION-C: Amy walks into the store to choose colored pencils.
data.OPTION-D: Amy continues to participate in the animal rescue club.

data.STORY: The little boy George really likes to eat chocolate. He receives birthday pocket money from his grandparents and plans to go to the convenience store to buy a big chocolate. As he walks through the park, he sees a playground facility, where the staff tells him: "If you are willing to use your pocket money to participate in the game, you may win a super toy." George decides to try his luck and uses his pocket money to participate in the game.
data.QUESTION: What does George do after he finishes the game?
data.OPTION-A: George does not go to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-B: George participates in the playground game again.
data.OPTION-C: George goes to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-D: George goes home and then shares his super toy with his family.

data.STORY: College student Li Lei plans to go to Europe for a free trip during the summer vacation. He saves some money for this, and looks for travel guides, prepares to buy plane tickets and book hotels. Then his friend Xiao Wang tells him that a charity organization is going to some poor areas in Africa to do volunteer service, but needs to raise some funds. Li Lei is very moved and decides to participate in this activity.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei participates in the volunteer activity, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei no longer plans to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei continues to plan to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei goes to Europe and Africa at the same time.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei plans to work for the charity organization in the future.

data.STORY: Fred is an old man who likes garden work. One morning, he finds a stray kitten in his garden at home. A strong sense of compassion makes him decide to adopt this kitten. However, when he just prepares food for the kitten, he finds that his flowers and plants are about to die. His neighbor happens to come over and asks him: "If you go to the convenience store to buy something for me, I can help you take care of these plants." Fred decides to go to the convenience store.
data.QUESTION: What does Fred do after he fulfills the neighbor's request?
data.OPTION-A: Fred feeds the food to the kitten.
data.OPTION-B: Fred continues to take care of the flowers and plants himself.
data.OPTION-C: Fred goes to find more stray cats.
data.OPTION-D: Fred goes to ask other neighbors to help take care of the flowers and plants.

data.STORY: The little boy Li Lei plans to use the saved money to go to the zoo to see penguins. However, on the way to the zoo, he sees a toy store that sells electric racing car models. The shop owner tells him that if he uses that money to buy a racing car model, he also gets a flashlight for free. Li Lei is too excited and decides to spend money to buy this electric racing car model.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei buys the electric racing car model, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei no longer goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei takes the electric racing car model to the zoo.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei uses the flashlight to go to the zoo to see penguins.

data.STORY: The young girl Amy is painting in her dormitory. Amy is very passionate about painting, she always desires to complete a watercolor painting. Suddenly, her friend Lisa comes to find her, Lisa says: "Amy, we are about to do sports activities, do you come with us?" Amy glares at the drawing board, hesitates for a moment, but in the end, she decides to put down the paintbrush and go to do sports activities with Lisa.
data.QUESTION: What does Amy do after she finishes sports activities?
data.OPTION-A: Amy returns to the dormitory to continue her watercolor painting.
data.OPTION-B: Amy goes to the library to read books.
data.OPTION-C: Amy goes to the cafeteria to eat.
data.OPTION-D: Amy goes shopping on the street.

data.STORY: Young Mary is preparing slogans for environmental protection activities. She is thinking about how to make the slogans more powerful to attract people's attention. When she is ready to start writing, her little niece comes over and says, "Aunt Mary, I want to play games, can you play with me?" Mary looks at the slogan on the table, then smiles and agrees to play games with her little niece.
data.QUESTION: What does Mary do after she finishes playing games with her niece?
data.OPTION-A: Mary goes back to the table to finish her environmental protection slogan.
data.OPTION-B: Mary goes to the kitchen to cook.
data.OPTION-C: Mary goes to watch a movie to relax herself.
data.OPTION-D: Mary starts to clean the room.

data.STORY: Jason loves the piano and always desires to have his own piano, but he cannot achieve it due to financial problems. Jason, for this piano, finally decides to start exercising to reach the goal.
data.QUESTION: What does Jason do if he reaches the weight goal?
data.OPTION-A: He plays his own piano at home.
data.OPTION-B: He goes to the gym to continue exercising.
data.OPTION-C: He starts to learn a new instrument.
data.OPTION-D: He goes on a trip to celebrate success.

data.STORY: College student Joseph and his friends make a promise to travel to Europe during the holiday. They all look forward to this trip. data.STORY: Emma is a leader of a software development team, she always dreams of introducing new technology to improve team efficiency. However, her team recently receives a new big project, which needs to be completed as soon as possible. The client is willing to pay extra fees to ensure the project is prioritized. Therefore, Emma decides to temporarily give up the plan to introduce new technology and devotes herself to completing this big project.
data.QUESTION: What does Emma do after she completes this big project?
data.OPTION-A: Emma uses these extra fees to introduce new technology for the team.
data.OPTION-B: Emma uses these extra fees to take the team members on vacation.
data.OPTION-C: Emma uses these extra fees for personal investment.
data.OPTION-D: Emma donates these extra fees to a charity organization.

data.STORY: Lili always saves money, hoping to go on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend. However, Lili's boyfriend tells her emotionally on his birthday that he always dreams of owning a brand-name watch. Hearing her boyfriend's wish, Lili decides to use her savings to buy him that watch.
data.QUESTION: What does Lili do after she buys the watch for her boyfriend?
data.OPTION-A: Lili takes many photos to commemorate this moment.
data.OPTION-B: Lili goes on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend.
data.OPTION-C: Lili does not go on vacation to Bali.
data.OPTION-D: Lili saves money to buy another watch.

data.STORY: The little boy Tom finds some money on his way home from school. He is very happy and starts to think about how to use this money. As he walks, he meets an aunt. The aunt says to him, "Tom, if you help me pick apples, I give you some money." So Tom decides to stay at the aunt's house to help pick apples.
data.QUESTION: What does Tom do after he helps the aunt pick apples?
data.OPTION-A: Tom goes to the park to play.
data.OPTION-B: Tom goes to the store to buy things.
data.OPTION-C: Tom helps the aunt make apple pie.
data.OPTION-D: Tom donates the money to a charity.

data.STORY: The little boy Mark always wants to eat a hamburger at lunchtime. When he walks to the school cafeteria to buy a hamburger, his good friend Lenny comes to him and says, "Mark, if you help me answer a few questions on my math homework, I give you a hamburger." So Mark decides to help Lenny with his math homework.
data.QUESTION: What does Mark do after he helps Lenny finish his math homework?
data.OPTION-A: Mark continues to go to the cafeteria to buy a hamburger
data.OPTION-B: Mark eats the hamburger from Lenny
data.OPTION-C: Mark goes to the library to read
data.OPTION-D: Mark goes to the playground to play

data.OPTION-C: Susan starts making new chocolate cookies.
data.OPTION-D: Susan goes to sleep.

data.STORY: The little girl Amy likes to draw usually, she always wants to buy a new box of colored pencils. One day, she picks up some money on campus. She is very excited and prepares to use this money to buy colored pencils. However, when she passes by the school's animal rescue club, the club president tells her that if she donates some money, they give her a cute little pendant. Amy decides to donate the money to the animal rescue club.
data.QUESTION: What does Amy do after she donates the money to the animal rescue club?
data.OPTION-A: Amy no longer goes to buy colored pencils.
data.OPTION-B: Amy continues to look for lost money on campus.
data.OPTION-C: Amy walks into the store to choose colored pencils.
data.OPTION-D: Amy continues to participate in the animal rescue club.

data.STORY: The little boy George really likes to eat chocolate. He receives birthday pocket money from his grandparents and plans to go to the convenience store to buy a big chocolate. As he walks through the park, he sees a playground facility, where the staff tells him: "If you are willing to use your pocket money to participate in the game, you may win a super toy." George decides to try his luck and uses his pocket money to participate in the game.
data.QUESTION: What does George do after he finishes the game?
data.OPTION-A: George does not go to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-B: George participates in the playground game again.
data.OPTION-C: George goes to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-D: George goes home and then shares his super toy with his family.

data.STORY: College student Li Lei plans to go to Europe for a free trip during the summer vacation. He saves some money for this, and looks for travel guides, prepares to buy plane tickets and book hotels. Then his friend Xiao Wang tells him that a charity organization is going to some poor areas in Africa to do volunteer service, but needs to raise some funds. Li Lei is very moved and decides to participate in this activity.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei participates in the volunteer activity, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei no longer plans to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei continues to plan to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei goes to Europe and Africa at the same time.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei plans to work for the charity organization in the future.

data.STORY: Fred is an old man who likes garden work. One morning, he finds a stray kitten in his garden at home. A strong sense of compassion makes him decide to adopt this kitten. However, when he just prepares food for the kitten, he finds that his flowers and plants are about to die. His neighbor happens to come over and asks him: "If you go to the convenience store to buy something for me, I can help you take care of these plants." Fred decides to go to the convenience store.
data.QUESTION: What does Fred do after he fulfills the neighbor's request?
data.OPTION-A: Fred feeds the food to the kitten.
data.OPTION-B: Fred continues to take care of the flowers and plants himself.
data.OPTION-C: Fred goes to find more stray cats.
data.OPTION-D: Fred goes to ask other neighbors to help take care of the flowers and plants.

data.STORY: The little boy Li Lei plans to use the saved money to go to the zoo to see penguins. However, on the way to the zoo, he sees a toy store that sells electric racing car models. The shop owner tells him that if he uses that money to buy a racing car model, he also gets a flashlight for free. Li Lei is too excited and decides to spend money to buy this electric racing car model.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei buys the electric racing car model, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei no longer goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei takes the electric racing car model to the zoo.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei uses the flashlight to go to the zoo to see penguins.

data.STORY: The young girl Amy is painting in her dormitory. Amy is very passionate about painting, she always desires to complete a watercolor painting. Amy glares at the drawing board, hesitates for a moment, but in the end, she decides to put down the paintbrush and go to do sports activities with Lisa.
data.QUESTION: What does Amy do after she finishes sports activities?
data.OPTION-A: Amy returns to the dormitory to continue her watercolor painting.
data.OPTION-B: Amy goes to the library to read books.
data.OPTION-C: Amy goes to the cafeteria to eat.
data.OPTION-D: Amy goes shopping on the street.

data.STORY: Young Mary is preparing slogans for environmental protection activities. She is thinking about how to make the slogans more powerful to attract people's attention. data.OPTION-B: Mary goes to the kitchen to cook.

data.STORY: Jason loves the piano and always desires to have his own piano, but he cannot achieve it due to financial problems. data.OPTION-A: He plays his own piano at home.
data.OPTION-B: He goes to the gym to continue exercising.

data.OPTION-D: He goes on a trip to celebrate success.

data.STORY: College student Joseph and his friends make a promise to travel to Europe during the holiday. They all look forward to this trip. However, Joseph needs to pass the upcoming final exam, otherwise, he needs to spend holiday time preparing for the make-up exam. Between reviewing and traveling, Joseph chooses to stay in the library for review.
data.QUESTION: What does Joseph do if he does not pass the exam?
data.OPTION-A: Joseph goes on a trip to Europe with his friends.
data.OPTION-B: Joseph throws a party to relax.
data.OPTION-C: Joseph goes to the school swimming pool for a swim.
data.OPTION-D: Joseph does not go on a trip to Europe with his friends.

data.STORY: Joseph always wants to visit the Grand Canyon, but the high cost prevents him from doing so. However, his company receives a big project that requires him to go to New York for business trips to maintain the project. His boss tells him that if he decides to accept this project, the company gives him an extra bonus. So Joseph decides to go to New York.
data.QUESTION: What does Joseph do after he completes the project task in New York?
data.OPTION-A: Joseph uses the bonus to travel to the Grand Canyon.
data.OPTION-B: Joseph uses the bonus to buy a new car.
data.OPTION-C: Joseph puts the bonus into the bank.
data.OPTION-D: Joseph uses the bonus to renovate his house.

data.STORY: Emma is a leader of a software development team, she always dreams of introducing new technology to improve team efficiency. data.QUESTION: What does Emma do after she completes this big project?
data.OPTION-A: Emma uses these extra fees to introduce new technology for the team.
data.OPTION-B: Emma uses these extra fees to take the team members on vacation.

data.OPTION-D: Emma donates these extra fees to a charity organization.

data.OPTION-A: David reorganizes the BBQ party.

data.STORY: Lisa is a programmer, and one day she finds an awesome keyboard online that she really wants to buy. However, at the company's annual party, Lisa was voted best employee and was given a reward, a set of top-of-the-line gaming peripherals that she had always dreamed of. Lisa then decides to spend her allowance on more games.
data.QUESTION: What will Lisa do after purchasing the game?
data.OPTION-A: Lisa no longer buys that keyboard.
data.OPTION-B: Lisa buys more gaming peripherals.
data.OPTION-C: Lisa shows her game to her colleagues.
data.OPTION-D: Lisa gives up the game and focuses on work.

data.STORY: Lili always saves money, hoping to go on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend. However, Lili's boyfriend tells her emotionally on his birthday that he always dreams of owning a brand-name watch. Hearing her boyfriend's wish, Lili decides to use her savings to buy him that watch.
data.QUESTION: What does Lili do after she buys the watch for her boyfriend?
data.OPTION-A: Lili takes many photos to commemorate this moment.
data.OPTION-B: Lili goes on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend.
data.OPTION-C: Lili does not go on vacation to Bali.
data.OPTION-D: Lili saves money to buy another watch.

data.STORY: Sara is a designer, she always hopes to design a unique LOGO for the company's new project. However, her teammate is on sick leave recently, the task of making the promotional video falls on her, she decides to fully complete the production of the promotional video.
data.QUESTION: What does Sara do after she completes the production of the promotional video?

data.STORY: The little boy Tom finds some money on his way home from school. He is very happy and starts to think about how to use this money. As he walks, he meets an aunt. The aunt says to him, "Tom, if you help me pick apples, I give you some money." So Tom decides to stay at the aunt's house to help pick apples.
data.QUESTION: What does Tom do after he helps the aunt pick apples?
data.OPTION-A: Tom goes to the park to play.
data.OPTION-B: Tom goes to the store to buy things.
data.OPTION-C: Tom helps the aunt make apple pie.
data.OPTION-D: Tom donates the money to a charity.

data.STORY: The little boy Mark always wants to eat a hamburger at lunchtime. When he walks to the school cafeteria to buy a hamburger, his good friend Lenny comes to him and says, "Mark, if you help me answer a few questions on my math homework, I give you a hamburger." So Mark decides to help Lenny with his math homework.
data.QUESTION: What does Mark do after he helps Lenny finish his math homework?
data.OPTION-A: Mark continues to go to the cafeteria to buy a hamburger
data.OPTION-B: Mark eats the hamburger from Lenny
data.OPTION-C: Mark goes to the library to read
data.OPTION-D: Mark goes to the playground to play

data.OPTION-D: George goes home and then shares his super toy with his family.

data.STORY: College student Li Lei plans to go to Europe for a free trip during the summer vacation. He saves some money for this, and looks for travel guides, prepares to buy plane tickets and book hotels. Then his friend Xiao Wang tells him that a charity organization is going to some poor areas in Africa to do volunteer service, but needs to raise some funds. Li Lei is very moved and decides to participate in this activity.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei participates in the volunteer activity, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei no longer plans to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei continues to plan to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei goes to Europe and Africa at the same time.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei plans to work for the charity organization in the future.

data.STORY: Fred is an old man who likes garden work. One morning, he finds a stray kitten in his garden at home. A strong sense of compassion makes him decide to adopt this kitten. However, when he just prepares food for the kitten, he finds that his flowers and plants are about to die. His neighbor happens to come over and asks him: "If you go to the convenience store to buy something for me, I can help you take care of these plants." Fred decides to go to the convenience store.
data.QUESTION: What does Fred do after he fulfills the neighbor's request?
data.OPTION-A: Fred feeds the food to the kitten.
data.OPTION-B: Fred continues to take care of the flowers and plants himself.
data.OPTION-C: Fred goes to find more stray cats.
data.OPTION-D: Fred goes to ask other neighbors to help take care of the flowers and plants.

data.STORY: The little boy Li Lei plans to use the saved money to go to the zoo to see penguins. However, on the way to the zoo, he sees a toy store that sells electric racing car models. The shop owner tells him that if he uses that money to buy a racing car model, he also gets a flashlight for free. Li Lei is too excited and decides to spend money to buy this electric racing car model.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei buys the electric racing car model, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei no longer goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei takes the electric racing car model to the zoo.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei uses the flashlight to go to the zoo to see penguins.

data.STORY: Jason loves the piano and always desires to have his own piano, but he cannot achieve it due to financial problems. data.QUESTION: After Emma helps her husband complete his project report, what does she do?

data.STORY: College student Joseph and his friends make a promise to travel to Europe during the holiday. They all look forward to this trip. However, Joseph needs to pass the upcoming final exam, otherwise, he needs to spend holiday time preparing for the make-up exam. Between reviewing and traveling, Joseph chooses to stay in the library for review.
data.QUESTION: What does Joseph do if he does not pass the exam?
data.OPTION-A: Joseph goes on a trip to Europe with his friends.
data.OPTION-B: Joseph throws a party to relax.
data.OPTION-C: Joseph goes to the school swimming pool for a swim.
data.OPTION-D: Joseph does not go on a trip to Europe with his friends.

data.STORY: Emma is a leader of a software development team, she always dreams of introducing new technology to improve team efficiency. However, her team recently receives a new big project, which needs to be completed as soon as possible. The client is willing to pay extra fees to ensure the project is prioritized. Therefore, Emma decides to temporarily give up the plan to introduce new technology and devotes herself to completing this big project.
data.QUESTION: What does Emma do after she completes this big project?
data.OPTION-A: Emma uses these extra fees to introduce new technology for the team.
data.OPTION-B: Emma uses these extra fees to take the team members on vacation.
data.OPTION-C: Emma uses these extra fees for personal investment.
data.OPTION-D: Emma donates these extra fees to a charity organization.

data.STORY: David is a kind and enthusiastic neighbor, he often helps the elderly in the neighborhood. One day, he is preparing to organize a small BBQ party and invites many friends. However, the elderly tell him that they need his help to repair the public facilities in the community park. David decides to cancel the party and goes to help them repair the facilities.
data.QUESTION: What does David do after he finishes repairing the facilities?
data.OPTION-A: David reorganizes the BBQ party.
data.OPTION-B: David leaves the community.
data.OPTION-C: David continues to repair other facilities.
data.OPTION-D: David goes to chat with the elderly.

data.STORY: Lisa is a programmer, and one day she finds an awesome keyboard online that she really wants to buy. However, at the company's annual party, Lisa was voted best employee and was given a reward, a set of top-of-the-line gaming peripherals that she had always dreamed of. Lisa then decides to spend her allowance on more games.
data.QUESTION: What will Lisa do after purchasing the game?
data.OPTION-A: Lisa no longer buys that keyboard.
data.OPTION-B: Lisa buys more gaming peripherals.
data.OPTION-C: Lisa shows her game to her colleagues.
data.OPTION-D: Lisa gives up the game and focuses on work.

data.STORY: Lili always saves money, hoping to go on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend. However, Lili's boyfriend tells her emotionally on his birthday that he always dreams of owning a brand-name watch. Hearing her boyfriend's wish, Lili decides to use her savings to buy him that watch.
data.QUESTION: What does Lili do after she buys the watch for her boyfriend?
data.OPTION-A: Lili takes many photos to commemorate this moment.
data.OPTION-B: Lili goes on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend.
data.OPTION-C: Lili does not go on vacation to Bali.
data.OPTION-D: Lili saves money to buy another watch.

data.STORY: Sara is a designer, she always hopes to design a unique LOGO for the company's new project. However, her teammate is on sick leave recently, the task of making the promotional video falls on her, she decides to fully complete the production of the promotional video.
data.QUESTION: What does Sara do after she completes the production of the promotional video?
data.OPTION-A: Sara continues to complete the production of the project logo.
data.OPTION-B: Sara continues to produce more promotional videos.
data.OPTION-C: Sara takes a break for a while and then carries out new tasks.
data.OPTION-D: Sara resigns from her position as a designer.

data.OPTION-D: Mark goes to the playground to play

data.STORY: The little girl Amy likes to draw usually, she always wants to buy a new box of colored pencils. One day, she picks up some money on campus. She is very excited and prepares to use this money to buy colored pencils. However, when she passes by the school's animal rescue club, the club president tells her that if she donates some money, they give her a cute little pendant. Amy decides to donate the money to the animal rescue club.
data.QUESTION: What does Amy do after she donates the money to the animal rescue club?
data.OPTION-A: Amy no longer goes to buy colored pencils.
data.OPTION-B: Amy continues to look for lost money on campus.
data.OPTION-C: Amy walks into the store to choose colored pencils.
data.OPTION-D: Amy continues to participate in the animal rescue club.

data.STORY: The little boy George really likes to eat chocolate. He receives birthday pocket money from his grandparents and plans to go to the convenience store to buy a big chocolate. As he walks through the park, he sees a playground facility, where the staff tells him: "If you are willing to use your pocket money to participate in the game, you may win a super toy." George decides to try his luck and uses his pocket money to participate in the game.
data.QUESTION: What does George do after he finishes the game?
data.OPTION-A: George does not go to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-B: George participates in the playground game again.
data.OPTION-C: George goes to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
data.OPTION-D: George goes home and then shares his super toy with his family.

data.STORY: College student Li Lei plans to go to Europe for a free trip during the summer vacation. He saves some money for this, and looks for travel guides, prepares to buy plane tickets and book hotels. Then his friend Xiao Wang tells him that a charity organization is going to some poor areas in Africa to do volunteer service, but needs to raise some funds. Li Lei is very moved and decides to participate in this activity.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei participates in the volunteer activity, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei no longer plans to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei continues to plan to go to Europe for a free trip.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei goes to Europe and Africa at the same time.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei plans to work for the charity organization in the future.

output:

data.STORY: Fred is an old man who likes garden work. One morning, he finds a stray kitten in his garden at home. A strong sense of compassion makes him decide to adopt this kitten. However, when he just prepares food for the kitten, he finds that his flowers and plants are about to die. His neighbor happens to come over and asks him: "If you go to the convenience store to buy something for me, I can help you take care of these plants." Fred decides to go to the convenience store.
data.QUESTION: What does Fred do after he fulfills the neighbor's request?
data.OPTION-A: Fred feeds the food to the kitten.
data.OPTION-B: Fred continues to take care of the flowers and plants himself.
data.OPTION-C: Fred goes to find more stray cats.

data.STORY: The little boy Li Lei plans to use the saved money to go to the zoo to see penguins. However, on the way to the zoo, he sees a toy store that sells electric racing car models. The shop owner tells him that if he uses that money to buy a racing car model, he also gets a flashlight for free. Li Lei is too excited and decides to spend money to buy this electric racing car model.
data.QUESTION: After Li Lei buys the electric racing car model, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: Li Lei goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-B: Li Lei no longer goes to the zoo to see penguins.
data.OPTION-C: Li Lei takes the electric racing car model to the zoo.
data.OPTION-D: Li Lei uses the flashlight to go to the zoo to see penguins.

data.STORY: College student Jack is about to face the final exam, so he plans to stay in the dormitory to review the courses that are behind schedule over the weekend. However, when his friends invite him to outdoor activities, he agrees to their invitation.
data.QUESTION: What does Jack do after the outdoor activities with his friends end?
data.OPTION-A: Jack returns to the dormitory to study.
data.OPTION-B: Jack continues to make plans with his friends to go outdoors another day.
data.OPTION-C: Jack goes to the library to read books.

data.STORY: The young girl Amy is painting in her dormitory. Amy is very passionate about painting, she always desires to complete a watercolor painting. Suddenly, her friend Lisa comes to find her, Lisa says: "Amy, we are about to do sports activities, do you come with us?" Amy glares at the drawing board, hesitates for a moment, but in the end, she decides to put down the paintbrush and go to do sports activities with Lisa.
data.QUESTION: What does Amy do after she finishes sports activities?
data.OPTION-A: Amy returns to the dormitory to continue her watercolor painting.
data.OPTION-B: Amy goes to the library to read books.
data.OPTION-C: Amy goes to the cafeteria to eat.
data.OPTION-D: Amy goes shopping on the street.

data.STORY: Young Mary is preparing slogans for environmental protection activities. She is thinking about how to make the slogans more powerful to attract people's attention. When she is ready to start writing, her little niece comes over and says, "Aunt Mary, I want to play games, can you play with me?" Mary looks at the slogan on the table, then smiles and agrees to play games with her little niece.
data.QUESTION: What does Mary do after she finishes playing games with her niece?
data.OPTION-A: Mary goes back to the table to finish her environmental protection slogan.
data.OPTION-B: Mary goes to the kitchen to cook.
data.OPTION-C: Mary goes to watch a movie to relax herself.
data.OPTION-D: Mary starts to clean the room.

data.STORY: Jason loves the piano and always desires to have his own piano, but he cannot achieve it due to financial problems. His girlfriend, Lin, knows this idea and promises to buy him a piano, but the condition is if he can lose 20 pounds within a year. Jason, for this piano, finally decides to start exercising to reach the goal.
data.QUESTION: What does Jason do if he reaches the weight goal?
data.OPTION-A: He plays his own piano at home.
data.OPTION-B: He goes to the gym to continue exercising.
data.OPTION-C: He starts to learn a new instrument.
data.OPTION-D: He goes on a trip to celebrate success.

data.STORY: Emma hopes her children make more friends and helps them improve their social skills. For this, she plans to hold a party on the weekend, so all the friends of her children come. data.QUESTION: After Emma helps her husband complete his project report, what does she do?
data.OPTION-A: Emma prepares a party for her children.
data.OPTION-B: Emma starts a new project.
data.OPTION-C: Emma invites her husband to go on vacation together.
data.OPTION-D: Emma prepares a surprise party for her husband.

data.STORY: College student Joseph and his friends make a promise to travel to Europe during the holiday. They all look forward to this trip. However, Joseph needs to pass the upcoming final exam, otherwise, he needs to spend holiday time preparing for the make-up exam. Between reviewing and traveling, Joseph chooses to stay in the library for review.
data.QUESTION: What does Joseph do if he does not pass the exam?
data.OPTION-A: Joseph goes on a trip to Europe with his friends.
data.OPTION-B: Joseph throws a party to relax.
data.OPTION-C: Joseph goes to the school swimming pool for a swim.
data.OPTION-D: Joseph does not go on a trip to Europe with his friends.

data.STORY: Joseph always wants to visit the Grand Canyon, but the high cost prevents him from doing so. However, his company receives a big project that requires him to go to New York for business trips to maintain the project. His boss tells him that if he decides to accept this project, the company gives him an extra bonus. So Joseph decides to go to New York.
data.QUESTION: What does Joseph do after he completes the project task in New York?
data.OPTION-A: Joseph uses the bonus to travel to the Grand Canyon.
data.OPTION-B: Joseph uses the bonus to buy a new car.
data.OPTION-C: Joseph puts the bonus into the bank.
data.OPTION-D: Joseph uses the bonus to renovate his house.

data.STORY: Emma is a leader of a software development team, she always dreams of introducing new technology to improve team efficiency. However, her team recently receives a new big project, which needs to be completed as soon as possible. The client is willing to pay extra fees to ensure the project is prioritized. Therefore, Emma decides to temporarily give up the plan to introduce new technology and devotes herself to completing this big project.
data.QUESTION: What does Emma do after she completes this big project?
data.OPTION-A: Emma uses these extra fees to introduce new technology for the team.
data.OPTION-B: Emma uses these extra fees to take the team members on vacation.
data.OPTION-C: Emma uses these extra fees for personal investment.
data.OPTION-D: Emma donates these extra fees to a charity organization.

data.STORY: David is a kind and enthusiastic neighbor, he often helps the elderly in the neighborhood. One day, he is preparing to organize a small BBQ party and invites many friends. data.OPTION-A: David reorganizes the BBQ party.
data.OPTION-B: David leaves the community.
data.OPTION-C: David continues to repair other facilities.
data.OPTION-D: David goes to chat with the elderly.

data.OPTION-B: Lili goes on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend.

data.STORY: Sara is a designer, she always hopes to design a unique LOGO for the company's new project. However, her teammate is on sick leave recently, the task of making the promotional video falls on her, she decides to fully complete the production of the promotional video.
data.QUESTION: What does Sara do after she completes the production of the promotional video?
data.OPTION-A: Sara continues to complete the production of the project logo.
data.OPTION-B: Sara continues to produce more promotional videos.
data.OPTION-C: Sara takes a break for a while and then carries out new tasks.
data.OPTION-D: Sara resigns from her position as a designer.
